mapper.sql: UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, COMP_ORD, CRE_COMP_NM, COMP_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.insert: insert into WAD_UOD_CRE_COMP (UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, COMP_ORD, CRE_COMP_NM, COMP_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM) values (#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creCompNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update WAD_UOD_CRE_COMP
COMP_ORD = #{compOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CRE_COMP_NM = #{creCompNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAD_UOD_CRE_COMP set COMP_ORD = #{compOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CRE_COMP_NM = #{creCompNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT COMP_DCD , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM ( SELECT 'DataImp' AS COMP_DCD , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_IMP WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'SubsetCol' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_COL_DASE_DV WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'SubsetRow' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_ROW_DV WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'Join' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_JN WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'Filter' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'Cleansing' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_DATA_CLN WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'ODBP' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_BOXPLOT WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'ODIsFr' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_ISL_FRST WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'ODLOF' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_LCL_OTL_FCTR WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'ODOCV' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_ONE_CLSS_SVM WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'ODELEV' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_ELLPT_ENVLP WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'RRGR' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_RBST_RGRS WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT 'SaveRes' , UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , CRE_COMP_ID FROM WAD_UODC_SV_RES WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 =1 AND UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
